listAsq.title: Where Can I Sell Used Items?
listAsq.content:
Selling second-hand items can be time-consuming. Platforms like Facebook Marketplace, eBay, or OfferUp require negotiating with strangers, waiting for responses, and arranging meetups—which isn’t always safe or efficient.
Another option is visiting a pawn shop, but traditional locations often pay much less than expected.
At Pawn Shop Buddy Cash, we offer a smarter solution. Sell valuables at a competitive price without leaving home. Just send a photo, and we’ll provide a quick estimate. No obligations, no wasted time.
We know pawn shops in Miami don’t always have the best reputation, which is why we focus on transparency and convenience.

listAsq.title: Who Purchases Pre-Owned Items?
listAsq.content:
Few companies in Miami buy everything at once. Many pickup services simply haul things away for free without paying owners.
You could sell things individually through online marketplaces, but is it worth the hassle?
At Pawn Shop Buddy Cash, we make selling easy. We buy gold, diamonds, bicycles, yachts, phones, refrigerators—even real estate. Our free at-home evaluation means you don’t have to go anywhere.

listAsq.title: Do You Provide Pickup Services?
listAsq.content: Yes! We offer professional pickup across Florida. No matter where you are, our team can come the same day to assess and purchase your valuables.

listAsq.title: How Does an In-Person Evaluation Work?
listAsq.content:
Contact us via iMessage, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, or email. Send photos with model details, and within 10–15 minutes, you’ll receive a price estimate. If you agree, a specialist will visit the same day for an in-person check. Payment is made immediately after inspection.
To ensure accuracy, disclose any defects upfront. Few pawn shops in Miami offer this level of service, making us a trusted choice.

listAsq.title: What Is Pawn Shop Buddy Cash?
listAsq.content:
Fast Online Estimates: No need to visit multiple locations—get a fair price within minutes.
Competitive Pricing: Unlike many pawn shops, we offer rates based on real market data.
Convenience: If you accept our quote, we’ll come to you the same day with payment ready.

listAsq.title: When Will I Get Paid?
listAsq.content:
At Pawn Shop Buddy Cash, payment is made immediately after verifying the condition and functionality. We offer multiple options: Cash, Zelle, Cash App, Venmo, and PayPal.
For shipped items, payment is issued on the same day we receive the package. We cover all shipping and insurance costs to ensure a smooth transaction.
